name: 4M Arena
description:
"No one remembers how this competition started.

Four teams have been pitting their ships against each other for the sake of victory..."

Welcome to the LXXIV edition of the definitive confrontation between the first teams to gain supremacy between systems. Four ships are at your disposal, choose and fight in each of the four Arenas to rise to victory over your opponents...

The teams

ZXS : X80 fighter. Team color yellow.

C64 : Interceptor Sidiouss . Team color red.

MSX : Frigate Mambo. Blue team colour.

CPC : Destroyer Gammaray . Team color green.

Arenas

Space. In orbit near the transit space station, the ships challenge each other in a zero-gravity environment.

Moon. Old mining colony to obtain Octanium and abandoned several hundred years ago, it is the ideal place for the final confrontations.

Terra. One of the most popular colonies of the empire, all of it is a casino, and of course the main attraction is the fights to the death between the most popular teams.

Well of Souls. Located on the planet Magna B with one of the highest gravities known, it is the toughest Arena for both machines and pilots.

Game instructions

The game consists of a fight to the best of two fights.

Each of the Arenas differ in their gravity that make the movements of the ships more difficult.

You cab only shoot if the ship is in free fall.

When a ship has been shooted it was few sconds of immunity.

Press button joystick 1 for two players.

Press button joystick 2 for one player.
